00035 RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab::ObjectsTab(QWidget *parentWidget)
00036                : QWidget(parentWidget){
00037 
00038   LOGI("Creating ObjectsTab");
00039 
00040   isNodeHighLighted=false;
00041   highLightNode=NULL;
00042   highLightEntity=NULL;
00043 
00044   QVBoxLayout* layout=new QVBoxLayout(this);
00045   this->setLayout(layout);
00046 
00047   objTree=new QTreeWidget();
00048   layout->addWidget(objTree);
00049 
00050   setupTreeView();
00051 
00052   QObject::connect(objTree, SIGNAL(itemDoubleClicked(QTreeWidgetItem* , int)),
00053                    SLOT(objectTreeClicked( QTreeWidgetItem *, int )));
00054 
00055   LOGI("ObjectsTab created");
00056 }

00074 void RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab::setupTreeView(){
00075 
00076   QStringList header;
00077   header << tr("Name") << tr("Filename/Pos") << tr("Count/Rot");
00078 
00079   objTree->setColumnCount(3);
00080   objTree->setHeaderLabels(header);
00081 
00082   xmlObjectList xol;
00083   ObjectMeshList* meshList=xol.getMeshList();
00084 
00085   ObjectMeshList::const_iterator iter;
00086   for (iter=meshList->begin(); iter != meshList->end(); iter++){
00087     addObjectMesh((*iter));
00088     
00089   }
00090 }

00097 void RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab::addObjectMesh(ObjectMesh* om){
00098   std::string name=om->getName();
00099   const char* meshFile=om->getMeshFile();
00100 
00101   ObjectPosList opl=om->getPosList();
00102   int count=opl.size();
00103   QString txtCount;
00104   txtCount.setNum(count);
00105 
00106   QTreeWidgetItem *item=new QTreeWidgetItem();
00107   item->setText(0, name.c_str());
00108   item->setText(1, meshFile);
00109   item->setText(2, txtCount);
00110 
00111   QString toolTip=tr("Left double-click to open a dialog");
00112   item->setToolTip(0, toolTip);
00113   item->setToolTip(1, toolTip);
00114   item->setToolTip(2, toolTip);
00115 
00116   objTree->addTopLevelItem( item );
00117 
00118   ObjectPosList::const_iterator iter;
00119   for (iter=opl.begin(); iter != opl.end(); iter++){
00120     addObjectMeshChilds((*iter), item);
00121     
00122   }
00123 
00124 }

00134 void RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab::
00135 addObjectMeshChilds(ObjectPos op, QTreeWidgetItem* parent)
00136 {
00137 
00138   QString temp;
00139 
00140   std::string name(op.getName());
00141 
00142   QString pos;
00143 
00144   // Makes the position string
00145   temp.setNum(op.getPosX());
00146   pos +=temp;
00147   pos +=",";
00148 
00149   temp.clear();
00150   temp.setNum(op.getPosY());
00151   pos +=temp;
00152   pos +=",";
00153 
00154   temp.clear();
00155   temp.setNum(op.getPosZ());
00156   pos +=temp;
00157 
00158   // Makes the rotation string
00159   QString rot;
00160 
00161   temp.clear();
00162   temp.setNum(op.getRotW());
00163   rot +=temp;
00164   rot +=",";
00165 
00166   temp.clear();
00167   temp.setNum(op.getRotX());
00168   rot +=temp;
00169   rot +=",";
00170 
00171   temp.clear();
00172   temp.setNum(op.getRotY());
00173   rot +=temp;
00174   rot +=",";
00175 
00176   temp.clear();
00177   temp.setNum(op.getRotZ());
00178   rot +=temp;
00179 
00180   QTreeWidgetItem *item=new QTreeWidgetItem(parent);
00181   item->setText(0, name.c_str());
00182   item->setText(1, pos);
00183   item->setText(2, rot);
00184 
00185   QString toolTip=tr("Left double-click to go to this object");
00186   item->setToolTip(0, toolTip);
00187   item->setToolTip(1, toolTip);
00188   item->setToolTip(2, toolTip);
00189 
00190 }

00202 void RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab::
00203 objectTreeClicked( QTreeWidgetItem * it, int col)
00204 {
00205 
00206   LOGI("The treeView was clicked");
00207   int i=objTree->indexOfTopLevelItem(it);
00208   const char* name=it->text(0).toLatin1();
00209 
00210   if (i==-1){
00211     LOGI("An ObjectPos was clicked");
00212     //    lookAtObject(it);
00213     selectObject(it->text(0));
00214     PosorDialog pod;
00215     pod.setPosName(it->text(0));
00216     pod.exec();
00217   }
00218   else{
00219     LOGI("An ObjectMesh was clicked");
00220     LOGCATS("ObjectMesh name : ");
00221     LOGCATS(name);
00222     LOGCAT();
00223 
00224     StaticMeshDialog smd(name);
00225     int res=smd.exec();
00226   }
00227 }

00236 void RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab::lookAtObject(QTreeWidgetItem* it){
00237   QString posText=it->text(1);
00238   QString xTxt=posText.section(',', 0, 0);
00239   QString yTxt=posText.section(',', 1, 1);
00240   QString zTxt=posText.section(',', 2, 2);
00241 
00242   LOGI("Getting position of the object :");
00243   LOGCATS("X=");
00244   LOGCATS(xTxt.toLatin1());
00245   LOGCATS(" Y=");
00246   LOGCATS(yTxt.toLatin1());
00247   LOGCATS(" Z=");
00248   LOGCATS(zTxt.toLatin1());
00249   LOGCAT();
00250 
00251   // The lookAt position
00252   float lx, ly, lz;
00253   lx=xTxt.toFloat();
00254   ly=yTxt.toFloat();
00255   lz=zTxt.toFloat();
00256 
00257   // The camera position
00258   float cx, cy, cz;
00259   cx=lx-1.0f;
00260   cy=ly;
00261   cz=lz;
00262 
00263   // Real is a float
00264   Ogre::Camera* cam=Ogre::Root::getSingleton()
00265     .getSceneManager("MainEditorView")
00266     ->getCamera("MainEditorCam");
00267 
00268   cam->setPosition (cx, cy, cz);
00269   cam->lookAt (lx, ly, lz);
00270 }

00277 void RainbruRPG::Editor::ObjectsTab::selectObject(const QString& name){
00278   LOGI("ObjectsTab::setBoundingBox called");
00279 
00280 
00281   Ogre::SceneManager* sm=Ogre::Root::getSingleton()
00282     .getSceneManager("MainEditorView");
00283 
00284   //  const char* n=name.toLatin1();
00285   //  const char* n=name.toAscii();
00286   std::string n=std::string(name.toAscii());
00287   LOGCATS("Entity name : '");
00288   LOGCATS(n.c_str());
00289   LOGCATS("'");
00290   LOGCAT();
00291 
00292   Ogre::String s=n;
00293   SelectionManager::getSingleton().selectNewObject(s);
00294 }
